Johnny Gallagher (The Specialist, Mr. Simpson) is thrilled to be a part of this cast. Johnny has traveled throughout the country working in many regional theatres and in tours. Previous roles include Man #1 I Love You, You’re Perfect, Now Change, Jamie The Last Five Years, Herod Jesus Christ Superstar, Jack Into the Woods, Cliff Cabaret, Matt The Marriage of Bette and Boo, Rosencrantz Rosencrantz and Guildenstern Are Dead, “We Beseech Thee” Godspell, The Courier 1776 and Dickon The Secret Garden. Johnny currently teaches theatre at Baden Academy Charter School.
